00035 TracesMenu::TracesMenu(void)
00036   : Menu("traces", Help()
00037         .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Traces")),
00038     m_pcliShowNode(NULL), m_pcliShowFilterNode(NULL), m_pcliShowClassesNode(NULL),
00039     m_pcliNoNode(NULL), m_pcliTraceNode(NULL), m_pcliFilterParam(NULL), m_pcliAllFilterNode(NULL)
00040 {
00041     EnsureTraces();
00042 }
00043 
00044 TracesMenu::~TracesMenu(void)
00045 {
00046 }
00047 
00048 void TracesMenu::SetCli(Cli& CLI_Cli)
00049 {
00050     Menu::SetCli(CLI_Cli);
00051     {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Show traces behavior"));
00052         m_pcliShowNode = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("show", cli_Help)));
00053         {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Show current filter"));
00054             m_pcliShowFilterNode = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliShowNode->AddElement(new Keyword("filter", cli_Help)));
00055             m_pcliShowFilterNode->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00056         {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Show all trace classes"));
00057             m_pcliShowClassesNode = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliShowNode->AddElement(new Keyword("classes", cli_Help)));
00058             m_pcliShowClassesNode->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }}
00059     {   SyntaxTag* pcli_Tag = dynamic_cast<SyntaxTag*>(& AddElement(new SyntaxTag(false)));
00060         {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Trace setting"));
00061             m_pcliTraceNode = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& pcli_Tag->AddElement(new Keyword("trace", cli_Help)));
00062             {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Filter selection"));
00063                 m_pcliTraceFilterNode = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliTraceNode->AddElement(new Keyword("filter", cli_Help)));
00064                 {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Trace class name"));
00065                     m_pcliFilterParam = dynamic_cast<ParamString*>(& m_pcliTraceFilterNode->AddElement(new ParamString(cli_Help)));
00066                     m_pcliFilterParam->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }}
00067             {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "All traces"));
00068                 m_pcliAllFilterNode = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliTraceNode->AddElement(new Keyword("all", cli_Help)));
00069                 m_pcliAllFilterNode->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }}
00070         Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Remove traces"));
00071         m_pcliNoNode = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("no", cli_Help)));
00072         m_pcliNoNode->AddElement(new SyntaxRef(*pcli_Tag)); }
00073 }
00074 
00075 const bool TracesMenu::ExecuteReserved(const CommandLine& CLI_CmdLine) const
00076 {
00077     bool b_Show = true;
00078 
00079     int i_CmdLineIndex = 0;
00080     const cli::Element* pcli_Element = NULL;
00081     #define CLI_STEP_IT() do { if (i_CmdLineIndex >= CLI_CmdLine.GetElementCount()) return false; pcli_Element = & CLI_CmdLine[i_CmdLineIndex++]; } while(0)
00082 
00083     CLI_STEP_IT();
00084     if (0) {}
00085     else if (pcli_Element == & GetShowNode())
00086     {
00087         CLI_STEP_IT();
00088         if (0) {}
00089         else if (pcli_Element == & GetShowFilterNode())
00090         {
00091             CLI_STEP_IT();
00092             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(pcli_Element))
00093             {
00094                 ShowCurrentFilter();
00095                 return true;
00096             }
00097         }
00098         else if (pcli_Element == & GetShowClassesNode())
00099         {
00100             CLI_STEP_IT();
00101             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(pcli_Element))
00102             {
00103                 ShowAllClasses();
00104                 return true;
00105             }
00106         }
00107     }
00108     else if (pcli_Element == & GetNoNode())
00109     {
00110         CLI_STEP_IT();
00111         b_Show = false;
00112         if (0) {}
00113         else if (pcli_Element == & GetTraceNode())
00114         {
00115             CLI_STEP_IT();
00116             goto trace_label;
00117         }
00118     }
00119     else if (pcli_Element == & GetTraceNode())
00120     {
00121         CLI_STEP_IT();
00122 trace_label:
00123         if (0) {}
00124         else if (pcli_Element == & GetFilterNode())
00125         {
00126             CLI_STEP_IT();
00127             if (const cli::Param* pcli_Param = dynamic_cast<const cli::Param*>(pcli_Element))
00128             if (pcli_Param->GetCloned() == & GetFilterParam()) {
00129                 pcli_Param = dynamic_cast<const cli::Param*>(pcli_Element);
00130                 GetFilterParam().CopyValue(*pcli_Param);
00131                 CLI_STEP_IT();
00132                 if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(pcli_Element))
00133                 {
00134                     SetFilter(GetFilterParam(), b_Show);
00135                     return true;
00136                 }
00137             }
00138         }
00139         else if (pcli_Element == & GetAllFilterNode())
00140         {
00141             CLI_STEP_IT();
00142             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(pcli_Element))
00143             {
00144                 SetAllFilter(b_Show);
00145                 return true;
00146             }
00147         }
00148     }
00149 
00150     return Menu::ExecuteReserved(CLI_CmdLine);
00151 }
00152 
00153 const bool TracesMenu::Execute(const CommandLine& CLI_CmdLine) const
00154 {
00155     return false;
00156 }

00158 void TracesMenu::ShowAllClasses(void) const
00159 {
00160     GetOutputStream() << "All classes:" << endl;
00161     DisplayClassList(GetTraces().GetAllClasses());
00162 }
00163 
00164 void TracesMenu::ShowCurrentFilter(void) const
00165 {
00166     GetOutputStream() << "Current filter:" << endl;
00167     DisplayClassList(GetTraces().GetCurrentFilter());
00168 }
00169 
00170 void TracesMenu::DisplayClassList(const TraceClass::List& Q_Classes) const
00171 {
00172     for (   TraceClass::List::const_iterator it = Q_Classes.begin();
00173             it != Q_Classes.end();
00174             it ++)
00175     {
00176         // Margin.
00177         unsigned int ui_Len = 0;
00178         for (; ui_Len < GetShell().GetHelpMargin(); ui_Len ++)
00179         {
00180             GetOutputStream() << " ";
00181         }
00182 
00183         // Display class name.
00184         GetOutputStream() << "<" << it->GetName() << ">";
00185         ui_Len += (it->GetName().size() + 2);
00186 
00187         // Offset.
00188         if (ui_Len >= GetShell().GetHelpOffset())
00189         {
00190             GetOutputStream() << " ";
00191             ui_Len ++;
00192         }
00193         for (; ui_Len < GetShell().GetHelpOffset(); ui_Len ++)
00194         {
00195             GetOutputStream() << " ";
00196         }
00197 
00198         // Description.
00199         GetOutputStream() << it->GetDescription();
00200         ui_Len += it->GetDescription().size();
00201 
00202         // End of line.
00203         GetOutputStream() << endl;
00204     }
00205 }

00207 void TracesMenu::SetFilter(const std::string& STR_ClassName, const bool B_Show) const
00208 {
00209     TraceClass cli_Class(STR_ClassName, "");
00210     GetTraces().SetFilter(cli_Class, B_Show);
00211 }
00212 
00213 void TracesMenu::SetAllFilter(const bool B_Show) const
00214 {
00215     GetTraces().SetAllFilter(B_Show);
00216 }
